scripts.start: npm run install-all && npm run start-production
scripts.start-production: npm run production-build && npm run start --prefix=server
scripts.production-build: npm run build --prefix=client && npm run build-server
scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build-client: env-cmd -f client.env npm run build --prefix client
scripts.dev-server: env-cmd -f server.env npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.install-all: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
